segments.text: The little boy is so determined, stretching his arm into that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a clever plan, using a plate to catch the spoils, I suppose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His younger sister is right there, hand raised, eagerly anticipating her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’ve clearly plotted this out, working together to achieve their sugary goal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: However, that stool beneath him looks terribly precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s tilted back, and those splayed legs don't inspire confidence at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling and hurting himself, or breaking the jar, is unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor is already soaking wet from the overflowing sink; a fall would be worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocent mischief is overshadowed by the very real danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I admire their teamwork, but I really dread the inevitable crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bittersweet moment, seeing their cunning combined with such peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope they manage to get their cookies without anyone getting hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
